Home » 40P23 Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)
23 Saṃkiliṭṭhattika, Kusalattika
Saṃkiliṭṭhattika, Kusalattika
32.
103Nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha…pe…  avigate cha.
104Nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
105Nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha…pe…  avigate cha.
